```{r echo=TRUE}
p <- 0.5
q <- 1 - p
k <- 300
##
# Generation
##
X <- sample(x = c(-1, 1),
            size = k,
            replace = T,
            prob = c(p, q)
            )
```


```{r echo=TRUE}
M_k <- c(0, 
         sapply(seq_along(X), function(x){sum(X[1:x])}))
```
